IDocumentation
signing_in

This module contains routines to let the user to sign into the platform uDUS.

Here takes place checking the login, password and rights to sign in (a Doctor has different rights over a Nurse or an Admin)

Contents

  • Settings
  • Sign in

Settings

Set default data

Sign in

Check the login, if the user passed correct password - sign him (her) into the platform on proper user page
